allCardSave.tailsDes: Be a space traveller in your spaceship

allCardSave.cardDes: You earned eternal fame as an honourable athlete in heaven.
allCardSave.tailsDes: No I walk away from those honors

allCardSave.cardDes: You entered Paradise.
You entered Purgatory
allCardSave.headsDes: Let your soul stuck between world matters
allCardSave.tailsDes: Let your soul attach between people

allCardSave.cardDes: You can reincarnate with a new destiny...
Your body fails  you feel so ill… and die in sick pain.
allCardSave.headsDes: So sick in cantonese sounds like Su Shi the poet
allCardSave.tailsDes: Ok next time I will take more care to my body

allCardSave.cardDes: You Entered the Void.
Congratulations  you have escaped the simulation. Welcome to the real world.
Hey  you. You're finally awake. You were trying to cross the border  right? Walked right into that Imperial ambush  same as us  and that thief over there.
You died as a baby….. Somehow…..
After you died you become friends with ghosts
You entered HELL
The angels appreciate the virtue you showed in life. You now have an exclusive spot in heaven.
You are now before the angel council. Spectating a heated debate!
allCardSave.tailsDes: This is not your problem. go chill elsewhere

allCardSave.cardDes: This haven place is pretty neat.  There are many places where you can relax
allCardSave.headsDes: Go drink from a radiant fountain

allCardSave.cardDes: Consuming havenly foods has some odd effects. You start feeling odd and lightheaded
Your conciousness fades into nothingness and your existance fuses with the universe.
The angel council is voting on humanity's destiny. Many are arguing that humanity should be exterminated for being evil
This does not affect you. However. guilt shall haunt you for the rest of eternity. Do you truly deserve heaven?
A compassionate angel feels sorry for you and your kind and tries to convince the council to show mercy.
An irritated angel looks at you.  She asserts that humanity is indeed unsalvageable from your actions~
allCardSave.headsDes: No we human really tried to avoid evilness but sadly sometimes we just can't control ourselves. I am sorry
allCardSave.tailsDes: I am not afraid of you. I am right and you are wrong! (Fight)

allCardSave.cardDes: You manage to convince a couple of angels. And there are enough votes to prevent the destruction of humankind.
You are kicked from heaven for being too proud. You shall be escorted to hell
You are in heaven and saved humanity. What more could you ask for
You relied on the power of demons in your life... now its time to pay this debt with your soul
allCardSave.headsDes: Submit to the Overlord of hell

allCardSave.cardDes: The overlord of hell seems amused by your futile struggling. Perhaps you could get on his good side
The Mighty Overlord is in a good mood today. You shall be his foot rest for the rest of eternity
How dare you. You are executed on the spot for disrespecting the Overlord
allCardSave.headsDes: I lived the way I liked
allCardSave.tailsDes: Rules are meant to be broken

allCardSave.cardDes: Your dance was great entertainment. The demons are excited and ask you about entertainment on the surface...
The demons are very impressed by your incredible tales. You are granted great powers to bring Earth entertainment to hell
allCardSave.headsDes: Have fun and hang out in hell
allCardSave.tailsDes: Gain the support of other lesser demons

allCardSave.cardDes: The lesser demons admire you and would like to elect you as their new Overlord
allCardSave.tailsDes: Let the elections take their course

allCardSave.cardDes: You have angered the Mighty Overlord. Terrible punishment awaits you in the torture chambers of hell
You thought you were about to die but the alien mothership has come to your place to collect and preserve your body.
allCardSave.tailsDes: Try to complain with your last remaining strength

allCardSave.cardDes: you are finally awakened from cryogenic sleep. How do you greet the aliens
allCardSave.headsDes: let me go. I want to go back home and die on Earth

allCardSave.cardDes: After waking up you notice that you are feeling odd
allCardSave.headsDes: check if your body is ok

allCardSave.cardDes: Your new alien family likes you but is very confused about your odd attachment to bux. What do you do with your now obsolete currency?
You brought some bacteria and viruses on board with you. They are harmless to humans but the aliens are very sick and have no cure...
You are the last one left on this barren planet... there are plenty of resources for you to live in comfort for your last few years of life
allCardSave.headsDes: Become the Lone Emperor of Planet X
allCardSave.tailsDes: Live in regret and shame and die in solitude

allCardSave.cardDes: After a few weeks your alien family has managed to teach you telepathic communication
allCardSave.headsDes: join the colony as a citizen
allCardSave.tailsDes: stay with your family as a pet
